Title: Resolutely overthrow the anti-Party clique of Wang, Zhang, Jiang and Yao!
Designer: Lu Xun Art Academy (鲁迅美术学院)
Notes: On 6 October 1976, Hua Guofeng has the Gang of Four arrested. Jiang Qing, Mao's widow, is pictured bottom left. Top left is Wang Hongwen, top right Zhang Chunqiao, bottom right Yao Wenyuan.
